statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 24 \\ -4 \\ -28 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -15 \\ 4 \\ 18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 33 \\ -4 \\ -38 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
